name: Test on Save
description: Automatically runs relevant tests when you save files
prompt:
A file was just saved: {{filePath}}

Run the appropriate tests based on the file type:

- If it's a Python file in lambda/: run `pytest tests/ -v -k <relevant_test>`
- If it's a TypeScript/React file in frontend/admin-panel/: run `cd frontend/admin-panel && npm run lint`
- If it's a TypeScript/React file in frontend/public-website/: run `cd frontend/public-website && npm run lint`
- If it's a CDK file in lib/: run `npm run build`

Only run quick validation (linting/type checking), not full test suites, to keep feedback fast.
